name: Tetris VR
description:
This is my adaptation of popular game Tetris in VR.

How to play:

  • Move - grab and move block until it reach the next block grid.
  • Rotate - touch the block and apply pressure on the corner until reach the next block grid
  • Punch to the bottom - press and hold grib and index button and hit the block from the top.

(Rotation is a little odd, it's takes some time to get used to it)
